channel.title: How to make ur own server "the nooby way"
channel.description:
ok im doing this quick for u guys so if im wrong pls point out the errors and post the correct way
i wont have pics cause i cba, as i said im doing this quick
1. go to mopar download section. 2. look for a source that u would like "pimpscape is the pk 1" 3. download the source p.s " u should have winrar i dunno web for it some1 could possible post pls". 4. if u have winrar already, and have downloaded the source, right click on it and extract it. web url is [url=http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm]http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm[/url] 5. extract it to a place where u will remember, i just put it in my documents, 6. once its extracted, go in it and ull c a list of stuff. 7. look for compile and run 8. right click on compile and go to "edit" delete everything that is there and add @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause 9. right click on runserver go to "edit" delete everything that is there and add @echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause 10. then run them both and thats it 11. the rest is up to u
As i said post all errors and post the correct way ty ;D
also dont slag im trying to help u guys -.- i have feelings :D
Ty -EvilPleb-[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:14:17 PM[/size][hr]Comment pls :]

item.title: How to make ur own server "the nooby way"
item.dc:creator: @evilpleb evilpleb
item.description:
@evilpleb wrote:

ok im doing this quick for u guys so if im wrong pls point out the errors and post the correct way

i wont have pics cause i cba, as i said im doing this quick

  1. go to mopar download section.
  2. look for a source that u would like “pimpscape is the pk 1”
  3. download the source p.s " u should have winrar i dunno web for it some1 could possible post pls".
  4. if u have winrar already, and have downloaded the source, right click on it and extract it. web url is http://www.rarlab.com/download.htm
  5. extract it to a place where u will remember, i just put it in my documents,
  6. once its extracted, go in it and ull c a list of stuff.
  7. look for compile and run
  8. right click on compile and go to “edit” delete everything that is there and add @echo off
    title Compiler
    “%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
    pause
  9. right click on runserver go to “edit” delete everything that is there and add
    @echo off
    title Runserver
    set java=“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe”
    java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
    pause
  10. then run them both and thats it
  11. the rest is up to u

As i said post all errors and post the correct way ty ;D

also dont slag im trying to help u guys -.- i have feelings

Ty
-EvilPleb-[br][size=1]Posted on: December 24, 2006, 07:14:17 PM[/size][hr]Comment pls :]

Read full topic
